comments:
Build ID: BIRT 2.1.3

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Install BIRT 2.1.3 on AIX 
2. Open a report
3. Click Preview 


More information:
IN 199136 the comment for this error was to go to the latest Mozilla. The machine has the latest Mozilla. Where do we go from here?

Can you try with the lasted Eclipse version ( I20070625-1500) and JVM 1.5? Also it's better you use BIRT 2.2 release. I think there may be some issues when Eclipse try to initialize Mozilla browser in AIX. But since the error message by eclipse is so vague, the only thing I can think of is to try some higher version.

Thnaks for your help again. 
I tried 2.1.3 with Java 1.5 and received a core. 
This is from BIRT 2.2:

Thanks again for your help.
I was able to view Help on both BIRT 2.1.3 and 2.2.
Does the eclipse help show up in embedded browser or external browser? Can you post a screenshot if possible?
Also, does BIRT preview through toolbar button work fine or produce same error as well?

Created an attachment (id=77023)
Scrren shot of helpHELP BIRT 2.2 on AIX

I tried View Report from the menu bar. View Report as PDF. View Report with Web Viewer. All get the same error. 

Thanks for your continued help.

OK, seems eclipse is using the external browser when embedded browser is unavailable. In this case, BIRT designer also need to enforce using one of the available external browsers.

As the workaround, you can specify "always use external browser" in report preview preference and preview from menu bar. the preview tab from editor currently always assume using the embedded browser.

I have tested the circumvention. It works as described. This is a big step forward. The designer is now usable on AIX. Thanks for your help. Can we look forward to the preview panel working sometime in Release 2.2? 
Thanks again. You have been excellent.
This looks to be related to the SWT browser widget not being supported on some of the platforms.  Bug 77217 describes a similar issue on Solaris.
